channel.title: Eve Adams

item.title: Mentioned by Huffington Post Canada
item.description:
Why You Should Never Ask An MP About Her Hair
Back in June, McGregor -- formerly of Frank Magazine, presently of the Ottawa Citizen -- asked MP Eve Adams about expensing hair-care products during the last election. Adams responded (smartly, I thought) on Twitter, and out in the open. Later, McGregor ...
